description_expanded: FIZITI 16FT Trampoline with Enclosure Net & Basketball Hoop is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for outdoor play. A 16-foot outdoor trampoline with a safety enclosure net, basketball hoop, LED lights, and a sprinkler attachment. Supports up to 2000 lbs for kids and adults. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.

specifications.safety: Enclosure net; accessories vary by listing
